abstract: Unilever, the giant consumer products marketer, told reporters on Monday afternoon that it would be the “consumer goods presenting advertiser” on the iAd platform. Among other marketers to clamber aboard the iAd band wagon, according to announcements at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference on Monday, are AT&T, Best Buy, Walt Disney and Target.
snippet: Unilever, the giant consumer products marketer, told reporters on Monday afternoon that it would be the “consumer goods presenting advertiser” on the iAd platform. Among other marketers to clamber aboard the iAd band wagon, according to announceme...
lead_paragraph: How eager are advertisers to get behind the iAd mobile advertising platform being introduced by Apple? Some are sending news releases to herald their participation.
